no luck here either

try this
show package content of Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 2 ATi Wrapper
Then open resources folder
Then create folder called transgaming (inside the resource folder)
Inside transgaming, create a folder called c_drive
Inside c_drive, create a folder called Program Files
Inside Program files, move your Activision folder 

That should work for ya.  Post back with results.
